ExperimentTitle: Gas Welding Set Up For Setting Up the Flame
Steps: Step 2: Tie oxygen and acetylene gas cylinder on the trolley with chain.
Step 3: Cracking of both the cylinder
Step 4: Fix regulators on both the cylinders.
Step 5: Hose connection to regulator and Welding torch.
Step 6: Set the gas pressure on the regulator as per nozzle size.
Step 7: Fix nozzle on Welding Torch.
Step 8: Open acetylene control valve about 1/4th and light the flame with spark lighter.
